description:
Our place is close to Chinatown, Lower East Side, Little Italy, Soho, East Village, East River, and Brooklyn. You’ll love our place because of the location, decor, nearby restaurants/bars/cafes, art  galleries, and natural light...Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and big groups.

Well-lit, comfortable apartment in a classic brick building in one of the coolest parts of downtown Manhattan.

Everything except closed closets & storage chests.

We'll be available to you via phone/msg as much as possible, but may also be traveling at times...

Centrally located in one of the coolest upcoming spots in NYC - Chinatown/Lower East Side.

Close to many subway lines and walking distance to some of the best spots in the City.
name: Entire 1 Bedroom Apt with Great Light & Vibes :)
